helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.description: Find answers to your questions here.

faqs.question: How to post an ad?
faqs.answer: To post a new ad, tap the 'Post Ad' button on the home screen. Then, select your category, fill in the required information, upload photos, and click the 'Post' button. Your ad will be sent for review.

faqs.question: Why was my ad rejected?
faqs.answer: Your ad may be rejected for several reasons, such as unclear photos, incorrect information, or violation of our guidelines. You will see the specific reason for rejection in the 'My Ads' section.

faqs.question: How can I change my password?
faqs.answer: Currently, the feature to change the password directly from the profile is not available. To reset your password, please log out and use the 'Forgot Password?' link on the login page.

faqs.question: How do I contact a seller for an item?
faqs.answer: On the ad detail page, you will see a 'Call' button to contact the seller. Tapping this button will allow you to call the seller directly.

helpCenter.moreHelpDescription: If you can't find the answer here, please contact us.
